author: travisyatsko
title: AI/ML Dataset Extraction Service
description: AI projects operate on data, currently extracting data from the blockchain is limited due to the requirement of running a node with db-sync.
solution: Create a service allowing for custom SQL queries and datasets enabling more AI/ML projects by reducing the burden of data gathering.
experience:
